name: Soda Saga
description:
Hi! This unfinished game was made in two weeks for a Portland Indie Game Squad Summer Slow Jam. I'm afraid I was too over-ambitious in what I could achieve in that period of time, but I learned a lot!

Music is courtesy of Oisín Treacy.

In SODA SAGA, you play as the SODA KID, a soft drink-loving hooligan who has been sent to an ALTERNATE UNIVERSE by his health freak science teacher, MR. STEINHAUSER-WATSON! In this strange world, CARBONATED DRINKS WERE NEVER INVENTED!

Upon cracking open a COLD ONE as the SODA KID usually does, the saccharine scents spread through the school, turning students and staff alike RABID WITH THIRST! Can the SODA KID use his newfound SODA POWERS to battle his way back to his home world... ALIVE?

CONTROLS:

ZInteract/AcceptXBackEnterMenu
SpaceInitiate battle
ShiftStart game
